mapper.insert: insert into review (member_id, corp_id, job_code, work_months, rev_title, rev_content, rev_rate, rev_pros, rev_cons, rev_public) values (#{memberId}, #{corpId}, #{jobCode}, #{workMonths}, #{revTitle}, #{revContent}, #{revRate}, #{revPros}, #{revCons}, #{revPublic})
mapper.update: update review set rev_title = #{revTitle}, rev_content = #{revContent}, rev_rate = #{revRate}, rev_pros = #{revPros}, rev_cons = #{revCons}, rev_public = #{revPublic} where review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: select review_id, member_id, corp_id, rev_title, rev_rate, rev_regdate, rev_updatedate from review where rev_public = 'y' order by rev_regdate desc
select review_id, member_id, corp_id, job_code, work_months, rev_title, rev_content, rev_rate, rev_pros, rev_cons, rev_public, rev_regdate, rev_updatedate from review where review_id = #{reviewId}
select review_id, corp_id, rev_title, rev_content, rev_rate, rev_regdate, rev_updatedate from review where member_id = #{memberId} order by rev_regdate desc
select review_id, member_id, rev_title, rev_content, rev_rate, rev_regdate, rev_updatedate from review where corp_id = #{corpId} order by rev_regdate desc
